Description:
Desirable Front Townhouse With Due North Aspect
Enjoy ground floor living with a due North aspect that opens onto a sunny and private courtyard. This townhouse is positioned at the front of the block and has a stylish and inviting street presence.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Only townhouse with ground floor living
- Private North facing courtyard
- Joinery integrated fridge built-in robes
- Heating and cooling throughout
- Blackbutt hardwood timber floors & quality carpets
- TV antenna and NBN ready
- Slimline auto garage door + second car park undercover
- Feature powder coated fencing
- Fully Landscaped
- Double glazing to all windows
- Guaranteed rental returns
- Holiday rental opportunity
Livability and convenience combine with classy high-end finishes and each townhouse is masterfully designed to deliver an effortless elegance. Enjoy sensational livability year-round with cleverly connected indoor and outdoor living spaces that allow you to enjoy all seasons in absolute comfort.
Internal area
157.93m²

Description:
Sunny, Light, Bright and Breezy
Private Inspections Welcome - By Appointment Only.
If light filled living in a sought after location is on your wish list, then the search is over. This contemporary home features open plan living with soaring ceilings and generous glazing that floods the room with natural light. Cool and breezy in summer and cosy in winter with a gas log, it is more than comfortable here all year round. The kitchen features gas cooking, a central island breakfast bar and double pantries that provide excellent storage.
There are three bedrooms in total, all with built in robes. The master bedroom has semi en-suite access. The interior decor has recently been refreshed with a coat of paint throughout and new laminate flooring in the living area and bedrooms. There is plentiful storage, a double garage and off street parking too. Outdoors the garden is fully fenced and private with space for entertaining on the sunny hardwood deck.
This established and quiet neighbourhood is perfectly positioned for making the most of coastal life. Leave the car at home and enjoy a gentle 600 metre stroll to the beach, playground and walking tracks.
A compact yet spacious home on a north facing easy care site with its own title is a rare and in demand combination. Downsize, up level or invest, this is a winner in every way.
Insights: 1/16 Island Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Titled Land Now Selling
The Dunes, Torquay has been designed to complement both the landscape and the laid back coastal lifestyle - while giving you state-of-the-art facilities and beautiful
scenery to build your new home.
Centrally located to let you make the most of Torquay's attractions The Dunes gives you quick and easy access to the beach and the Sands Golf Club, new shopping centres, schools, sporting facilities and just around the point leads you straight to Torquay's main beach.
Once you arrive home to The Dunes, the atmosphere, clean ocean air and open space will make it seem as if you are in a world of your own.
Insights: First listed on 25 September, this property has been on Domain for 25 days (last updated on 25 September).

Description:
Spectacular is an Understatement
If you want the best then your search is over! This stunning Victorian reproduction family home combines the best of yesteryear with modern comfort and a spectacular view. It is located in a quiet cul de sac and covers approx 47sq including a massive 6 car garage. The main kitchen/dining/family area is huge and affords sweeping views over Geelong CBD, Corio Bay, towards Leopold, Arthurs Seat and Barwon Heads, you can even watch the ships pass through the rip!
Upstairs there are four bedrooms and two living areas while downstairs has another bedroom, bathroom and huge games room. If entertaining and outdoor living is your thing then you will love the floodlit basketball court, salt chlorinated swimming pool and multiple barbecue areas. Other features include:
-stunning chandelier in the formal lounge with decorative Victorian ceiling roses cornices, and gas fire
-renovated en-suite and downstairs bathroom
-large Butlers pantry and timeless timber benchtops in the huge kitchen
-massive family room leading out to the balcony with 180° views over Geelong
-1299 m² block with plenty of yard space and access for boat/trailer/caravan
-5 kw Solar setup, security cameras, ducted vac and extra under house storage
This beautiful, ornate and quality built family home has everything you could ask for and represents excellent value for money. It is ideal for a large family where everyone can spread out and has plenty of room for all the toys in the massive garage. Call us now to arrange a private inspection of this exclusive, unique home.
Internal area
443m²

Description:
Downsize Without Compromise
Ideal for those searching for a sizeable home with a low maintenance yard making it perfect for anyone looking to get into the market or to downsize. Boasting three bedrooms all with built in robes and the master with a renovated ensuite. A well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and adjacent dining room that opens to a large deck area, which is perfect for those summer barbeques. An open plan living area that captures the northern sun has a R/C air conditioner whilst outside there is a remote-controlled garage with roller door access to the yard. Here is a fitting home for you to enjoy and add your own touches. Call today!

Description:
Welcome home...
With charm, poise, and position this beautifully maintained property is the ideal family home or investment property. Offering easy single level living with established gardens, a north facing rear yard and just 200m to Whites beach.
Property:
- Built in 1999 by Hamlan Homes
- Sited on approximately 650sqm
- Inviting indoor/outdoor flow
- Federation style brick veneer
- Sealed pathways to front door
- Multiple living, entertaining and relaxation areas
- Tiled floor, carpet in bedrooms and living areas
- Open plan kitchen, dining and living
- Gas cooking on a stand-alone upright oven
- Laminate benchtops and kitchen cabinetry
- Full height glass sliding doors transition to a north facing entertainer's deck
- Master bedroom with feature bay window and plantation shutters
- All bedrooms with built in robes
- Gas wall heater in main living
- Open fireplace in second living area
- Reverse cycle heating and cooling in main living and master bedroom
- Separate laundry with storage and external access, large enough to be used as a craft room
- Large single garage with panel lift door, with external access to veranda and yard
- Undercover Merbau deck with resort style balustrade
- Fully landscaped easy-care gardens with established trees
- Enclosed rear yard
- Gas hot water
- Garden shed 1.5m x 1.5m
Lifestyle:
- Just 200m to Whites beach, where you can walk or ride all the way to Bells Beach
- Walk or ride to the best of Torquay's restaurants, cafés and boutique shopping
- Public transport, schools and medical facilities close by
- Stroll to the local corner shop on Loch Ard for milk, newspaper, sandwiches or a hot dim sim
- Explore our picturesque coastline to find the perfect wave or hiking trail
- In summer enjoy the Cowrie markets and Thursday evening Nightjar festival
- Stroll along the beach to the Salty Dog Café for an early morning coffee
Insights: 51 Loch Ard Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Fine Family Living With Uninterrupted Views
Showcasing expansive views over the Moorabool Valley and You Yangs, this family residence is simply stunning. The light-filled living zone flows onto the balcony for open-air living, while the Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza is only a short stroll away.
- Easy access to schools, private colleges, and the Ring Road
- Spacious open plan living and dining area occupies the upper level
- Kitchen features a b/in pantry and quality s/steel apps
- Downstairs lounge opens onto the west-facing alfresco
- Master bedroom with views, w/-in robe, large en suite with spa
- Two additional bedrooms (one with w/in robe, one with b/in robe)
- Main bathroom, sep. wc, laundry with storage, powder room
- Ducted heating, split-system air conditioner, ducted vacuum
- Low-maintenance gardens and secure backyard with mod grass
- Remote double lock-up garage features internal access

Description:
Retro townhouse in desirable pocket of old Highton.
Don't miss this chance to embrace townhouse living in a peaceful pocket of Old Highton! The interiors exude an irresistible retro vibe, while the north-facing balcony showcases breathtaking views!
With the vibrant Highton Village within walking distance from your front door, you won't have to venture far for your shopping and dining needs. Fitness enthusiasts can choose between the sporting grounds of Highton Reserve and McDonald Reserve, while public transport is also within easy reach. Families are taken great care of with Bellaire P.S, Highton Pre-School, Barwon Valley School, and Belmont High School just a short stroll away.
Positioned at the rear of the block, you'll love the sense of privacy this property offers. The floating staircase and floor-to-ceiling window make a striking statement upon entry, while overlooking the lush fernery. An abundance of northern light sweeps through the upstairs living room, which opens onto the balcony for breezy open-air living. Whether you're enjoying a casual BBQ with friends or simply relaxing on a lazy weekend, you'll love that this outlook is yours to keep forever. The living room flows through to the kitchen/dining zone, where the beautifully updated kitchen boasts stone benchtops, walk-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher and stainless steel Miele cooking appliances). Home to established trees, the secure courtyard wraps around the south and western sides of the home creating a leafy oasis for casual outdoor living.
- Dishwasher and Miele stainless steel oven, induction cooktop, rangehood
- Three large bedrooms
- Two bathrooms, two toilets, laundry with external access
- Swann wireless security system with two cameras
- Gas wall heater and automated shutters to living room
- Remote DLUG with internal access
- Space for 3rd vehicle/caravan
- Body Corporate fee of $385 per quarter
- Preferred settlement of 90-120 days

Description:
Charming Family Home In Great Location
This home is also available to inspect by Virtual Tour. Don't hesitate to contact us for more information.
Situated in a lovely elevated position, this solid brick 3 bedroom home, "Nyora" (meaning Cherry Tree) presents an ideal prospect for the first home buyer or investor. This traditional home occupies a desirable position in a family friendly neighbourhood close to schools, shops, the iconic Bellarine rail trail and just 15 minutes to Geelong.
On a generous block of land, flourishing roses line the path to the welcoming front verandah featuring federation tiles which complement the red earthy tones of the brickwork. Secure and privatised from the street the home features multiple living and dining areas. The kitchen is central to the open plan design with sliding doors opening out onto a paved and covered alfresco area.
The master bedroom with ensuite and WIR is located at the front of the house with a separate wing comprising 2 further bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom with separate WC and spacious laundry with outside access.
Lots of potential with the generous sized garden, and plenty of parking and storage options with two single lock up garages with rear roller door access. With sweeping views across Geelong, "Nyora" is waiting for potential purchasers to stamp their own personality on this well positioned home.
- Elevated position on generous sized block
- Ideal for first home buyer or investor
- Close to schools, shops, rail trail
- Multiple living and dining areas
- Kitchen with breakfast bar
- Two single lock up garages
Insights: 17 Highland Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
SIZE AND CONVENIENCE
Now titled, this sensational allotment of some 522m2 approx. with a 16.32 metre frontage and rectangle in shape provides the perfect blank canvas to build your dream coastal home or investment property.
The popular Quay 2 Estate is located centrally to the North Torquay sporting and shopping precinct with easy access to the Surf Coast Highway which will give you a drive time to Geelong of around 20 minutes and Melbourne and hour and ten minutes depending on the time of day.
With quality homes built and getting built in the estate and flexible building guide-lines on offer that allow the astute purchaser plenty of scope to design their new residence.
The land provides a very level building surface with very little to do other than put your plans in place for your new coastal lifestyle.

The Dunes, Torquay has been designed to complement both the landscape and the laid back coastal lifestyle - while giving you state-of-the-art facilities and beautiful
scenery to build your new home.
Centrally located to let you make the most of Torquay's attractions The Dunes gives you quick and easy access to the beach and the Sands Golf Club, new shopping centres, schools, sporting facilities and just around the point leads you straight to Torquay's main beach.
Once you arrive home to The Dunes, the atmosphere, clean ocean air and open space will make it seem as if you are in a world of your own.

Description:
Charming Cottage On Private Corner Block
The Feel:
Within the privacy of this fenced corner block lies a charming cottage, lovingly crafted by the propertys sole owners. Cedar clad exteriors open up to cathedral ceilings with Oregon beams, pine lining boards & Australian Oak hardwood floors, showcasing the craftsmanship of its era. Occupying 700m2 approx., established gardens attract abundant birdlife, covered verandas offer tranquil places to sit & a private master sanctuary are just some of the charms of this lovingly maintained home.
The Facts:
- Original home in prized location in old Barwon Heads, with potential for renovation
- Set on 701sqm approx. of established gardens with mature bottlebrush trees & veggie boxes
- Easy garden gate access from Wandin Court frontage, for leisurely daily strolls to the river
- Paved pathway to front entry with covered veranda
- Open plan meals & living area with SSAC, with timber-lined walls & pitched ceiling
- Original kitchen with recycled Baltic timber cabinetry & Belling electric oven/induction cooktop
- Additional absolute north-facing living room with bi-fold doors from main living
- Master bedroom w/ SSAC, en suite, cathedral ceiling & French doors to covered deck (potential for Airbnb, artists studio or teenagers retreat)
- 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs
- Study with built-in desk & direct access to west deck perfect for home office with client entry
- Central bathroom with Redgum benchtop & shower over spa bath
- Zoned ducted heating, 2 x SSACs, ceiling fans throughout
- 3,400ltr rainwater tank, 8 solar panels, instant gas hot water
- 1 Single carport with RC roller door + 1 DLUG offer plenty of vehicle storage & workshop capacity
- Outdoor lighting & security doors
- Convenient access to beaches, parks, playgrounds, golf, river, lake & school
The Owner Loves.
We love all of it, its such a hidden gem! We built this place by hand & the whole family enjoys coming to stay here. Its a great place to live in a wonderful local community, where we can walk to the river or into town for a coffee.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.
Insights: 49 Knox Drive, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 32 other 3 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming Living Only a Short Stroll from High Street
Ideally positioned within walking distance to the High Street shopping precinct, this charming residence promises a blissful lifestyle!
Set in a peaceful pocket of Belmont, you'll love that this location leaves you wanting nothing. The vibrant hub of High Street leaves you spoilt for choice with a variety of cafes and restaurants, along with big-brand stores and the Belmont Library. Child Care Centres and Oberon Primary School are a short stroll away, while Belmont High School and Oberon High School are within easy reach making this an ideal choice for families! Public transport is moments from your front door, while easy access to the Barwon River and Barwon Valley Golf Club adds the final touch to this family-friendly locale.
Inside, the interiors exude irresistible art deco charm with original polished floorboards, decorative plasterwork, and original windows. An abundance of northern light sweeps through the front living room and open plan dining/kitchen zone, which create the heart of the home. The living room is graced with an open fireplace, while the kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a large built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, canopy rangehood).
The sunroom offers immense versatility as a kids play space or study, while flowing onto the sheltered alfresco deck. This outdoor zone is perfect for both everyday living and entertaining loved ones. Parents will enjoy relaxing under the shade as they watch the little ones play in the secure yard, while the TV connection and dimmer downlights set the scene for superb outdoor entertaining.
All three bedrooms feature built-in robes, while the main bathroom boasts an open shower and bathtub. The laundry is complete with storage and a 2nd toilet. Ducted heating and four split-system air conditioners provide additional modern comfort. Secure parking is provided for two vehicles via Dudley Street, with the tall remote roller door accommodating trailers and caravans. Other features inc. an approx. 6-month-old hot water system, undercover storage area, garden shed, wood storage, and ample under-house storage.
Don't miss this opportunity to embrace the Belmont lifestyle you've been craving! Enquire today!
Insights: 12 Perth Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture-Perfect Family Living
If youve been searching for stylish living in a family-friendly location, then this is the one for you. With a beautiful renovation completed approx. three years ago, the layout inspires open-air living that is perfect for the modern family.
The charming Highton Village is a short walk away, leaving you spoilt for choice with shopping and dining options. A large selection of schools are also within walking distance, including Roslyn P.S, Bellaire P.S, Belmont High School and Barwon Valley School. The sporting grounds of both Highton Reserve and McDonald Reserve are nearby for fitness enthusiasts, while public transport is conveniently close by. Enjoy easy access to the Barwon River and High Street shopping precinct.
Showcasing white walls and polished floorboards, the interiors exude a breezy ambience. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the lively hub of the home, with glass bi-fold doors opening onto the wrap-around deck perfect for entertaining during the warm summer months! The kitchen also features a bi-fold window opening onto the deck, where you can enjoy lazy weekend brunches at your very own outdoor breakfast bar. The kitchen will delight with stone waterfall benchtops, seamless cabinetry, dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances (900mm oven, 800mm gas cooktop, 900mm rangehood). The built-in pantry provides ample storage, while the pendant lights make a chic statement above the island bench/breakfast bar.
Positioned at the rear of the home, the Master Bedroom creates a private retreat for busy parents. The walk-in robe leads through the luxe ensuite, which features floor-to-ceiling tiling, a large shower, single vanity and toilet. The main bathroom services three additional bedrooms with built-in robes, while the European laundry adds the final touch to the layout. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and two split-system air conditioners keep you in absolute comfort. Cottage-style gardens line the generous backyard, which is home to a cubby house. The secure driveway, single carport and remote single lock-up garage provide ample off-street parking.
With so much to offer, this picture-perfect home is an absolute treat.

Description:
Hightons Most Exclusive Court
Measuring an enormous 817sqm (approx.) and positioned in riverfalls, Geelongs premier lifestyle estate with million dollar homes and million dollar views. Perfectly located upon the winding rivers of delightful Buckley Falls, this huge allotment offers the very best in prestigious and luxury lifestyle opportunities and is likely the best allotment you can find anywhere in Geelong or the Surfcoast. A wide and spacious court location which includes direct access to master planned parks and walking tracks along the Barwon River. Capturing sweeping uninterrupted views across the river and beyond. Tucked quietly away from the hustle and bustle but still retaining all of the conveniences you would expect of a prestigious development. Close proximity to the Geelong Ring Road positions you perfectly, one-hour drive to Melbourne CBD and 25 minutes to the Surfcoast. Dont miss out on this opportuniyty to build a future for your family at Riverfalls, where the lifestyle is Exceptional by Design

Description:
889sqm in the Heart of Highton!
This very rare opportunity is yours for the taking. This large 889sqm (Approx.) block is positioned in a highly sought after and tightly held pocket of Highton. Positioned within a stones throw to the Highton Village, barwon river, Barrabool Hills Plaza and some of the best schools Geelong has to offer. Whether you wish to build your dream home or develop (STCA), the opportunities here are truly endless. Often sought and rarely found. This is the block you have been waiting for! Owners keen to meet market on the day. Enquire today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 6 Vanessa Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020.
